modName: Snow and Smoke - Martin's firearm Armory
descriptionHtml:
Hello every one , it's Martin again
or you can just call me "Chéng-Fung", is my real name.
Anyway I'm Taiwanese,I can read English but not very skillful, some times I need 
Google translation some character to complete this description.

About this mod, I release Snow & Smoke replace version in july.
But this time all firearm are standalone at all.  

and the texture problem I need more time to practice , because I learn 3Dmax、
Rhino by myself(and youtube for some tutorial video) since May 2015.
 
In this mod , you can get several firearms, some adapted from historicals 
weapon,others come from Japanese Anime.

Basically here's four different type firearms-Rifle、Shotgun、Windbuchse and 
Sniper.

Rifle can be forge in "Iron material"、Shotgun in Steel、Windbuchse in 
Glass,then Sniper can be find in Daedric .

List of all weapon：
I.Rifle 
1.Caplocks Rifle
2.Dyson Needle Rifle
3.Flintlock Rifle Musket
4.Flintlock Rifle Musket with Bayonet
5.Nauscaa's Rifle - From "Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind "by anime director 
Hayao Miyazaki.
6.Rifle Ball
7.Rifle Ball Invisble version
8.Victoria Bayonet

II.Shotgun
1."Solstheim"Shotgun
2.4E 174 Bayonet
3.Double-Barreled Shotgun
4.Double-Barreled Shotgun with Bayonet
5.Imperial Nock Gun
6.Shotgun Shells
7.Shotgun Shells Invisble version

III.Windbuchse
1.Black Marsh Swordbayonet
2.Black Marsh Windbuchse - A totaly silent air rifle,can fire without attract 
attention.
3.Black Marsh Windbuchse with Bayonet
4.Windbuchse Bullets
5.Windbuchse Bullets Invisble version

IV.
1.Gundo Sniper Gun-A magical Sniper gun from Anime"Chaika - The Coffin Princess"
2.Regular Gundosniper Ammo -can use in common combat
3.Regular Gundosniper Ammo Invisble version
4.Special Gundosniper Ammo - An Overpower version,see the video downthere↓ 
5.Special Gundosniper Ammo Invisble version
